pic_scanner.log_engine
======================

.. py:module:: pic_scanner.log_engine

Package Contents
----------------

.. py:data:: AUTHORS

   The authors of the project.

.. py:data:: DEFAULT_BASE_URL
   :value: 'http://localhost:8080/infer'


   str:
   The default base URL for the API.

.. py:data:: FILE_SYSTEM_DEFAULTS

.. py:data:: IMAGE_EXTENSIONS
   :value: ['.png', '.jpg', '.jpeg', '.bmp', '.tiff']


   list:
   A list of valid image extensions.

.. py:data:: LABEL_DESCRIPTIONS

   dict:
   A dictionary that contains the labels and their descriptions.

   The keys are the labels and the values are the descriptions.

.. py:data:: PROG_NAME
   :value: 'IS-NSFW-Scanner'


   The name of the program.

.. py:data:: RELEASE_MAP

   The release map for the project.

.. py:data:: UNIT_ABBREVIATION_MAP

   dict:
   A dictionary that maps unit abbreviations to their full names.

.. py:data:: URLS

   The URLs used in the project.

.. py:data:: VALID_LABELS

   set:
   A set of valid labels that can be used to classify images in the dataset.

.. py:data:: VERSION

   The version information for the project.

.. py:data:: PROG_DIRS

.. py:data:: ROOT_LOGGER

.. py:data:: MAIN_MOD_LOGGER

.. py:data:: MOD_LOGGER
